### USAGE ###
>        /files/download.json

### TL;DR; ###
Returns the raw file contents for a given path.

### DESCRIPTION ###
This endpoint will return the raw file contents for the
given path.

Query parameters:

>        path=VALUE          The path of directory to browse.
